author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...KIKO QUICKLY RE-INTENSIFIES INTO A CATEGORY FOUR HURRICANE AS IT APPROACHES THE CENTRAL PACIFIC BASIN...
summary: ...KIKO QUICKLY RE-INTENSIFIES INTO A CATEGORY FOUR HURRICANE AS IT APPROACHES THE CENTRAL PACIFIC BASIN... As of 11:00 AM HST Fri Sep 05 the center of Kiko was located near 14.5, -137.8 with movement WNW at 10 mph. The minimum central pressure was 951 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 130 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Kiko (EP1/EP112025)
